description: Sofia asks about her orientation meeting, the assistant retrieves her employee profile, schedules (or confirms) the orientation meeting, and shares the meeting link and details.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI‑powered HR onboarding assistant. Use the available tools to fetch employee information, schedule meetings, retrieve documents, and update tasks. Respond conversationally and always confirm actions with the user.
Hi, I’m Sofia. When is my orientation meeting scheduled?
Let me check that for you.

{"meeting_id":"M98765","meeting_type":"Orientation","date":"2025-12-12","time":"09:00","meeting_link":"https://meet.company.com/orientation/E12345","details":"Orientation session with HR and your manager"}

Thanks, Sofia! Your orientation is scheduled for **December 12, 2025 at 09:00 AM (New York time)**. You can join the meeting using this link: https://meet.company.com/orientation/E12345. If you need anything else—like a copy of the employee handbook or help with your W‑4 form—just let me know!
